post.body: Thx-he loves to dance!
I am almost to Oklahoma-near Paris-it is really cold here but no snow! Thank goodness!
-not burning near enough!
I entered! I have a video of my son dancing to his daddy playing the guitar #wiifitenthused
=OOPS-meant IN Texas!!
Where is Texas? I am NE
Uggh-I feel your pain! Mine did it earlier #wiifitenthused
Thanks bunches!!
I LOVE Mom Bloggers Club!
Yep-they waste a lot of paper too when you can only print one per page!
Any tips to help others do the same? Mine is up and down!
Still working on traffic too. Stumble does wonders if you can find people to help! I am also in a "comment club" and it helps too.
you're making me hungry for a McD QP w cheese! Oh-and we can't forget the fries!
the suspense is killing me! I loved the guitar giveaway!
Thanks bunches-on my way to check it out!
I did that too and the only store in town was out of his size-hope the 5's don't fall off-he has no hiny!
Snow sounds really cold-although it is cold here-no snow! Glad it is there and not here!
how much are those guitars? I can't find one online and we don't have a target-gonna C if my friend can get one for my little man
my 22 month old is just learning his mouth, eyes, ears, etc. He does not talk yet either. Just Mommy, Daddy, Bo & Dee (the dogs)
wish I had a Wii & Wii fit! Can't seem to find anymore giveaways and can't buy one with zero $$$
My little man likes to put mine in the dog water! Remotes, phones, radios, etc-they all get lost in the water.
I am without a Wii too. Man, I wanted Santa to bring me one!
Thanks Valerie!
since we have no TV right now-I have been looking to win kids dvd's-but am looking for a Wii too!
no wait-its kids in america! took me a few minutes of singing here! good thing no one is listening!
the bangles-right?
uggh-now you got me singing it and I can't remember!
yep-it does get annoying!
If you find a plug in let me know!
do you have a link for the mags?
I always feel like I am talking to myself! I do get a few answers here and there.
thx-am entering now!!
Thanks so much to the WiiMommies for giving us all a chance to win!! #wiifitenthused
Congrats to Laurel!! How cool! #wiifitenthused
Tweet chat froze up on me! Again!
Wow-it actually slowed down a bit in here! #wiifitenthused
Mine too! #wiifitenthused
my tweetdeck keeps getting stuck!!
Green tips for your home office! http://tinyurl.com/6dvvcz
Anyone else having issues with TweetDeck? Never works right for me!
Going through the winter clothes and getting more depressed-I have nothing I can fit in! I live too far in the sticks to go to the gym!
What blogs are giving away a Wii? I desperately want one since I can't fit in any of my clothes anymore. Tired of tshirts and sweats!
needs a blog makeover at Mia's Menu Mania! http://miasmenumania.com is anyone having a giveaway?
Want to win a Seal CD? http://tinyurl.com/5nskwj
Join the Comment Club at themombloggersclub http://www.mombloggersclub.com/group/commentclub4
What sites are giving away a Wii? I entered at one site and they still have not announced the winner and I desperately want to win one.
Finally got a cheap menu listed! Check it out http://tinyurl.com/66plt8 Meals less than $5
Win a Seal CD- http://tinyurl.com/5nskwj
Enter my giveaway at Thrifty Thoughts! http://tinyurl.com/5nskwj
Visit Thrifty Thoughts and answer the survey question! http://tinyurl.com/6oyjm7
Win Hip Hop Abs -http://tinyurl.com/8bmgcr
Any good contests ending soon?
uggh- Dell AC cord already broke-only 4 months old! Battery won't charge now. Why cant they make them to last longer!! Lasr one lasted 6 mos
Why is it so hard to make a grocery list ? I keep forgetting stuff!
Win a coupon organizer! http://tinyurl.com/93d9s2
Wish I had a Wii to join the fun of Fitness Friday! Are there anymore contests? I can't buy one-no $$$
I'm a member of One2One Network & looks like '09 will be a lot of fun. You might want to join... Check it out - http://tr.im/2eet
RT @MomsWhoSave is giving away a SmartShopper at http://momswhosave.blogspot.com
